data_table.description: MESA Eye Ancillary Study Dataset: This dataset provides Exam 2 Retinal Photography measures for MESA Classic participants.

variable.name: photora2
variable.comment: If Field 1 or Field 2 Is missing, photos will be incomplete. NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: photola2
variable.comment: If Field 1 or Field 2 Is missing, photos will be incomplete. NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: f1ra2
variable.comment: Field 1 is centered on the DISC. IF ABSENT CRAE AND CRVE WILL NOT BE MEASURABLE IN THIS EYE; IF PRESENT, SEE PHOTO GRADABILITY NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: f1la2
variable.comment: Field 1 is centered on the DISC. IF ABSENT CRAE AND CRVE WILL NOT BE MEASURABLE IN THIS EYE; IF PRESENT, SEE PHOTO GRADABILITY VARIABLE NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: f2ra2
variable.comment: Field 2 is the Macula and is centered on the fovea. IF ABSENT, AMD AND MACULAR EDEMA MAY NOT BE MEASURABLE IN THIS EYE; IF PRESENT, SEE PHOTO GRADABILITY VARIABLE NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: f2la2
variable.comment: Field 2 is the Macula and is centered on the fovea. IF ABSENT, AMD AND MACULAR EDEMA MAY NOT BE MEASURABLE IN THIS EYE; IF PRESENT, SEE PHOTO GRADABILITY VARIABLE NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: gradra2
variable.comment: THIS ASSUMES AT LEAST ONE DIGITAL IMAGE OF THE RIGHT EYE.0=All fields gradable; 1=Disc ungradable; 2=Portion of macula ungradable; 4= Portion of disc and macula ungradable; 5=Disc and macula ungradable; 6= All available fields ungradable. .SEE MESA DIGITAL GRADING MANUAL OF OPERATIONS (MOP) SECTION 5.1.1 QUALITY OF GRADING FOR MORE DETAILS REGARDING DEFINITIONS. NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: gradla2
variable.comment: THIS ASSUMES AT LEAST ONE DIGITAL IMAGE OF THE LEFT EYE.0=All fields gradable; 1=Disc ungradable; 2=Portion of macula ungradable; 4= Portion of disc and macula ungradable; 5=Disc and macula ungradable; 6= All available fields ungradable. .SEE MESA DIGITAL GRADING MANUAL OF OPERATIONS (MOP) SECTION 5.1.1 QUALITY OF GRADING FOR MORE DETAILS REGARDING DEFINITIONS. NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: f1grdra2
variable.comment: ASSUMES A DIGITAL IMAGE IS AVAILABLE FOR GRADING FIELD 1 NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: f1grdla2
variable.comment: ASSUMES A DIGITAL IMAGE IS AVAILABLE FOR GRADING FIELD 1 NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: f2grdra2
variable.comment: ASSUMES A DIGITAL IMAGE IS AVAILABLE FOR GRADING FIELD 2 NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: f2grdla2
variable.comment: ASSUMES A DIGITAL IMAGE IS AVAILABLE FOR GRADING FIELD 2 NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: reta2
variable.comment: WORSE EYE IS THE EYE WITH THE MORE SEVERE RETINOPATHY.COMPUTED SEVERITY LEVELS ARE DESCRIBED IN MORE DETAIL IN MESA MOP SECTION 5.2.2 RETINOPATHY SUBSECTION. HEX=hard exudates; SE=soft exudate; IRMA=intraretinal microvascular abnormalities; VL=venous loops; MAS=Microaneurysms; HEM=hemorrhages; NPR=Non-proliferative retinopathy; RET=retinopathy; PRP LASER =panretinal photocoagulation scars present; PR=proliferative retinopathy; HRC=high risk characteristics as defined in the Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study; and VH= vitreous hemorrhage. NOTE: RETINOPATHY IS GRADED MASKED TO DIABETES STATUS AND RETINOPATHY MAY BE FOUND IN PERSONS WITH AND WITHOUT DIABETES (EVEN THOUGH VALUE LABELS MAY INDICATE OTHERWISE). LEVEL 12 IS INDICATED WHEN SPECIFIC NONDIABETIC DISEASE E.G. RETINAL VEIN OCCLUSION, IS PRESENTTO EXAMINE RETINOPATHY IN PERSONS WITH DIABETES USE MESA DIABETES DEFINITION;TO EXAMINE IN NONDIABETIC PERSONS EXCLUDE ALL PERSONS WITH DIABETES. THIS 17 STEP SCALE IS RARELY USED IN CROSS-SECTIONAL ANALYSES.SEE AM J OPHTHALMOL 2006; 141:446-455 AND REFERENCES 29,30 IN THAT PAPER FOR MORE DETAIL ON SEVERITY SCALE USED IN MESA. TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTIONS: MAY BE COLLAPSED TO 4 LEVELS OR TO ANY vs. NONE (SEE OTHER RETINOPATHY VARIABLES IN THE DATSET BELOW, retca2 and anyreta2) COULD BE A PHENOTYPE BUT REVIEW REST OF DATASET FIRST.
variable.value: HEX, SE, IRMA, VL BUT NO MAS

variable.name: retra2
variable.value: HEX, SE, IRMA, VL BUT NO MAS

variable.name: retla2
variable.value: HEX, SE, IRMA, VL BUT NO MAS

variable.name: retca2
variable.comment: WORSE EYE IS THE EYE WITH THE MORE SEVERE RETINOPATHY.COMPUTED AS FOLLOWS FROM 'reta2' VARIABLE: 1=LEVELS 10-13; 2=LEVELS 14-31; 3=LEVELS 41-51; 4=LEVELS 60-80. THIS VARIABLE IS OFTEN USED IN EXAMINING ASSOCIATIONS WITH RETINOPATHY SEVERITY. TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: TO COLLAPSE FURTHER 1=NO RETINOPATHY; 2-4= RETINOPATHY; FOR A NO PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY vs. PROLIFERATIVE ANALYSIS, COMBINE 1-3 AS NON-PROLIFERATIVE. COULD BE A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: anyrta2
variable.comment: WORSE EYE IS THE EYE WITH THE MORE SEVERE RETINOPATHY.COMPUTED AS FOLLOWS FROM 'reta2' VARIABLE: 0=LEVELS <14; 1=LEVELS >=14 IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: hmaa2
variable.comment: THIS SUMMARY VARIABLE PROVIDES INFORMATION ON DESCRIBING MAS ONLY AND BLOT HEMORRHAGES ONLY OR BOTH WITH TWO SEVERITY LEVELS USING ETDRS STUDY STANDARD 2A. (value 5 is more severe than value 4) .FOR PURE MAS (ONLY) PHENOTYPE - SEE VARIABLE 'MAA2' FOR PURE HEM (ONLY) - A DIFFERENT PHENOTYPE - SEE 'HEMA2'.COMBINED HEM AND/OR MAS PHENOTYPE WOULD INCLUDE VALUES 2 to 5 AS PRESENT, VALUES 0 & 1 WOULD BE NONE.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE)

variable.name: maa2
variable.comment: THIS VARIABLE PROVIDES INFORMATION ONLY ON EYES WITH RETINAL MICROANEURYSMS AND NO RETINAL BLOT HEMORRHAGE. IT IS COMPUTED AS BEING PRESENT (1=YES) IF VARIABLE 'HMAA2' =2 AND ABSENT (0=NO) IF 'HMAA2' =0 OR 1. TO GET AT EYES WITH ANY MICROANEURYSMS, RECODE FROM 'HMAA2'. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: hema2
variable.comment: THIS VARIABLE PROVIDES INFORMATION ONLY ON EYES WITH RETINAL BLOT HEMORRHAGES AND NO MICROANEURYSMS . IT IS COMPUTED 1 (PRESENT) FROM HMA VARIABLE CODE =3 AND 0 (ABSENT) FROM HMA VARIABLE CODE =0 OR 1.TO GET AT EYES WITH ANY RETINAL BLOT HEMORRHAGES, RECODE FROM 'HMAA2'. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: hea2
variable.comment: HARD EXUDATE IS A RESULT OF LIPOPROTEIN DEPOSITION IN RETINA AND IS USUALLY ASSOCIATED WITH MACULAR EDEMA.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE) IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: sea2
variable.comment: SOFT EXUDATE, SOMETIMES CALLED COTTON WOOL SPOT, IS DUE TO RETINAL NERVE FIBER LAYER INFARCTION - A RESULT OF RETINAL ISCHEMIA. TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE) IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: irmaa2
variable.comment: IRMA ARE RETINAL COLLATERAL VESSELS IN AREAS OF RETINAL ISCHEMIA INDICATING A MORE SEVERE LEVEL OF RETINOPATHY. 8A IS A PHOTO STANDARD FROM ETDRS STUDY: EYES WITH IRMA >= 8A HAVE MORE SEVERE DISEASE THAN EYES WITH STD<8A.; TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 and 1 for FOR IRMA ABSENT AND 2 and 3 FOR IRMA PRESENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: vba2
variable.comment: VENOUS BEADING IS A MANIFESTATION OF SEVERE RETINAL ISCHEMIATRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE) IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: nvda2
variable.description: NEW VESSELS ON DISC WORSE EYE
variable.comment: RETINAL NEW VESSELS ON THE OPTIC DISC ARE A MANIFESTATION OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY DUE TO RETINAL ISCHEMIA; 10A IS A PHOTO STANDARD FROM ETDRS STUDY; EYES WITH STD > 10A HAVE MORE NEW VESSELS THAN EYES WITH STD <10AWHEN COMBINED WITH OTHER MANIFESTATIONS OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY IS EQUIVALENT TO 'retca2=4' TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE) FOR ABSENT; 2 WITH 3 (< 10A WITH >= 10A) FOR PRESENT; IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: nvdra2
variable.description: NEW VESSELS ON DISC RIGHT EYE

variable.name: nvdla2
variable.description: NEW VESSELS ON DISC LEFT EYE

variable.name: nvea2
variable.comment: RETINAL NEW VESSELS ELSEWHERE OUTSIDE THE OPTIC DISC MARGIN ARE ANOTHER MANIFESTATATION OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY DUE TO RETINAL ISCHEMIA; THE MORE AREA AFFECTED, THE MORE SEVERE THE DISEASEWHEN COMBINED WITH OTHER MANIFESTATIONS OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY IS EQUIVALENT TO 'retca2=4' )TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 1 (QUESTIONABLE) WITH 0 (NONE) FOR ABSENT and 2 (< 1/2 DISC AREA) WITH 3 (>= 1/2 DISC AREA) FOR PRESENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: fpa2
variable.comment: RETINAL FIBROUS PROLIFERATION IS ANOTHER MANIFESTATATION OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY DUE TO RETINAL ISCHEMIA; THE MORE AREA AFFECTED, THE GREATER THE DISEASE; FPD = fibrous proliferation within the optic disc area; FPE = fibrous profileration elsewhere outside the optic disc margin. WHEN COMBINED WITH OTHER MANIFESTATIONS OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY IS EQUIVALENT TO 'retca2=4' )TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NONE) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) FOR ABSENT; 2 (FPD ONLY), 3 (FPE ONLY) AND 4 (FPD AND FPE) FOR ANY FP PRESENT. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: prhvha2
variable.comment: PRERETINAL HEMORRHAGE OR VITREOUS HEMORRHAGE IS ANOTHER MANIFESTATATION OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY DUE TO RETINAL ISCHEMIA; THE MORE AREA AFFECTED, THE MORE SEVERE THE DISEASE .WHEN COMBINED WITH OTHER MANIFESTATIONS OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY IS EQUIVALENT TO 'retca2=4' )TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NONE) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) FOR ABSENT AND 2 (<1 DA) AND 3 (> 1 DA) FOR PRESENT. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: mea2
variable.comment: INCREASED PERMEABILITY OF RETINAL CAPILLARIES AND MAS MAY RESULT IN ACCUMULATION OF EXTRACELLULAR FLUID AND THICKENING OF NORMALLY COMPACT RETINAL TISSUE CALLED MACULAR EDEMA. IN SOME CASE, THE MACULAR EDEMA BECOMES CLINICALLY SIGNIFICANT. SEE MESA MOP PAGE 17 FOR DEFINITION OF CLINICALLY SIGNIFICANT MACULA EDEMA (CSME). "OTHER" REFERS TO EVIDENCE OF MACULA EDEMA ASSOCIATED WITH RETINOPATHY OFTEN ASSOCIATED WITH A SPECIFIC OCULAR OR SYSTEMIC CONDITION (e.g. RETINAL VEIN OCCLUSION).TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) FOR ABSENT; AND 2 (YES, BUT NOT CSME) and=3 FOR ANY MACULAR EDEMA PRESENT; EXCLUDE 7 FROM ANALYSIS IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: mectra2
variable.description: MACULAR EDEMA IN CENTER WORSE EYE
variable.comment: CENTER INVOLVEMENT SPECIFIES INVOLVEMENT OF FOVEA BY MACULAR EDEMA; CYSTS INDICATE MORE SEVERE INVOLVEMENT USUALLY ASSOCIATED WITH VISUAL LOSS (CAN CHECK VISUAL ACUITY DATA IN CORRESPONDING EYE). "OTHER" REFERS TO EVIDENCE OF MACULA EDEMA ASSOCIATED WITH RETINOPATHY OFTEN ASSOCIATED WITH A SPECIFIC OCULAR OR SYSTEMIC CONDITION (e.g. RETINAL VEIN OCCLUSION).TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NONE) and 1 (QUESTIONABLE) FOR ABSENT; 2 (PR AND CSME) AND 3 (CSME WITH CYSTS) FOR ANY PRESENT CENTRAL INVOLVEMENT; EXCLUDE 7 FROM THE ANALYSIS IS A RARE PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: mectrra2
variable.description: MACULAR EDEMA IN CENTER RIGHT EYE

variable.name: mectrla2
variable.description: MACULAR EDEMA IN CENTER LEFT EYE

variable.name: pcscra2
variable.comment: PANRETINAL PHOTOCOAGULATION IN A SCATTER PATTERN ACROSS THE RETINA OR IN SPECIFIC AREAS OUTSIDE MACULAR AREA LATER RESULTS IN SCARRING AND IS A SURROGATE FOR HAVING HAD ACTIVE SEVERE DISEASE. LOCAL AND/OR SCATTER PHOTOCOAGULATION IS USUALLY DONE TO PREVENT PRERETINAL AND VITREOUS HEMORRHAGE OR THE DEVELOPMENT OF RETINAL NEW VESSELS;IN ABSENCE OF RETINOPATHY IS USUALLY COMBINED WITH OTHER SIGNS OF PROLIFERATIVE RETINOPATHY WHICH MAY OR MAY NOT BE PRESENT (SEE VARIABLE 'RETA2';) TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINIE 0 (NONE) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE/INCOMPLETE) FOR ABSENT; 2, 3 AND 4 AS PRESENT NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: focrxa2
variable.comment: FOCAL LASER PHOTOCOAGULATION, EITHER AS TREATMENT OF LEAKING RETINAL MICROANEURYSMS (MA Rx ONLY) OR IN A GRID PATTERN IN MACULA IS DONE FOR THE TREATMENT OF LOCALIZED OR DIFFUSE MACULAR EDEMA (GRID ONLY Rx), OR SOMETIMES OBSERVED TOGETHER.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: SUGGEST COMBINE 0+1 FOR ABSENT AND 2-4 FOR PRESENT FOR ANALYSES NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: arma2
variable.comment: AMD IS CATEGORIZED HERE BY 3-LEVELS OF SEVERITY. EARLY AMD IS DEFINED BY PRESENCE OF DRUSEN AND/OR PIGMENTARY ABNORMALITIES; LATE AMD BY EXUDATIVE AMD SIGNS AND/OR GEOGRAPHIC ATROPHY. FURTHER INFORMATION CAN BE FOUND IN MESA PROTOCOL SECTION 5.1.2 AND OPHTHALMOLOGY 2006;1113:373-380. TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: FOR ANY AMD VARIABLE. COMBINE 1 (EARLY) and 2 (LATE) categories. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: rpaba2
variable.comment: INCREASED RETINAL PIGMENTAND/OR RPE DEPIGMENTATION IS A MANIFESTATION OF EARLY AMD IN ABSENCE OF SIGNS OF LATE AMD IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: larma2
variable.comment: LATE AMD IS DEFINED BY PRESENCE OF SIGNS OF EXUDATIVE AMD AND/OR GEOGRAPHIC ATROPHY IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: pgaa2
variable.comment: GEOGRAPHIC ATROPHY IN THE ABSENCE OF SIGNS OF EXUDATIVE AMD. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: exuda2
variable.comment: ALSO CALLED NEOVASCULAR AMD. SOMETIMES GEOGRAPHIC ATROPHY IS PRESENT. INFREQUENT IN MESA. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: armexra2
variable.comment: AMD MAY NOT BE ASCERTAINED FOR MANY REASONS (SEE VARIABLE 'armexroda2' . NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: rarmxra2
variable.comment: LISTS REASONS E.G. TRAUMA, LASER TREATMENT, RETINAL VESSEL OCCLUSION, RETINAL DYSTROPHY, MYOPIC DEGENERATION, PRESUMED OCULAR HISTOPLASMOSIS OR CHORIORETINAL TOXOPLASMOSIS SCAR, NONSPECIFIC INFLAMMATORY RETINAL LESION, RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY (ROP), NON AMD RETINAL PIGMENT EPITHELIAL ABNORMALITY, NON AMD DETACHMENT, UNKNOWN, OTHER [USUALLY FOUND IN COMMENT SECTION OF DETAIL GRADING] AND/OR A RETINAL COLOBOMA OR STAPHYLOMA NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: hda2
variable.comment: MEASURED ONLY IN ABOUT 50% OF MESA SUBJECTS. CURRENTLY CONSIDERED, BY ITSELF, NOT TO BE A SIGN OF AMD. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: dr125a2
variable.description: DRUSEN >= 125 UM IN DIAMETER WORSE EYE
variable.comment: LARGE DRUSEN ARE CONSIDERED A SIGN OF EARLY AMD. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: dr125ra2
variable.description: DRUSEN >= 125 UM IN DIAMETER RIGHT EYE

variable.name: dr125la2
variable.description: DRUSEN >= 125 UM IN DIAMETER LEFT EYE

variable.name: dr500a2
variable.comment: LARGE DRUSEN COVERING MORE AREA INDICATES MORE INVOLVEMENT IN MACULA AREA. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: softa2
variable.comment: PRESENCE OF ANY SOFT INDISTINCT AND/OR SOFT DISTINCT DRUSEN. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: softda2
variable.comment: LESS SEVERE TYPE OF DRUSEN THAN SOFT INDISTINCT DRUSEN IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: softia2
variable.comment: MORE SEVERE TYPE OF DRUSEN THAN SOFT DISTINCT DRUSEN IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: rpea2
variable.comment: RPE=retinal pigment epithelium IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: geoata2
variable.comment: DIFFERS FROM PURE GA VARIABL E ('PGAA2'_ BECAUSE EXUDATIVE AMD MAY BE PRESENT CONCURRENTLY IN WHICH CASE GA MAY RESULT FROM EXUDATIVE AMD AND/OR IT'S TREATMENT. SHOULD USE PURE GA AS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: pedrda2
variable.comment: A SIGN OF EXUDATIVE AMD. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: srnva2
variable.comment: A SIGN OF EXUDATIVE AMD IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: srhema2
variable.comment: A SIGN OF EXUDATIVE AMD IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: fibsca2
variable.comment: A SIGN OF EXUDATIVE AMD IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: armrxa2
variable.comment: 3 TYPES OF TREATMENT FOR EXUDATIVE AMD. INDICATES PRESENCE OF LATE AMD. CAN CONSIDER COMBINING WITH EXUDATIVE AMD (VARIABLE 'EXUDA2'). NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: baoa2
variable.comment: BLOCKAGE OF RETINAL ARTERIOLE OR ARTERY RESULTING IN INFARCTION OF RETINA.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: bvoa2
variable.comment: BLOCKAGE OF RETINAL BRANCH VENULE.[LEVEL 12 IN RETINOPATHY SEVERITY SCALE VARIABLE 'reta2']; CAN COMBINE WITH RETINAL CENTRAL VEIN OCCLUSION (variable Cvoa2)' TO GET RETINAL VEIN OCCLUSION.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: cvoa2
variable.comment: BLOCKAGE OF RETINAL CENTAL VEIN. [LEVEL 12 IN RETINOPATHY SEVERITY SCALE VARIABLE 'reta2']; CAN COMBINE WITH RETINAL BLANCH VEIN OCCULSION (variable 'bvoa2') TO GET RETINAL VEIN OCCUSION (RVO).TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: avna2
variable.comment: SEE MESA GRADING MOP SECTION 5.2.3 FOR MORE DETAILS.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: focna2
variable.comment: MAY BE SECONDARY TO HYPERTENSION;SEE MESA GRADING MOP SECTION 5.2.3 FOR MORE DETAILS.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: holla2
variable.comment: USUALLY FIBRIN OR CHOLESTEROL EMBOLUS SEEN IN RETINAL ARTERIOLES. OFTEN AT A BIFURCATION OF THE VESSEL.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: perata2
variable.comment: DEFINED AS RETINAL-CHOROIDAL ATROPHIC AREA AROUND DISC.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: astera2
variable.comment: SOAP-LIKE CRYSTALS FLOATING IN VITREOUS CAVITY IN FRONT OF RETINA. CAN OBSTRUCT VIEW OF RETINAL LESIONS.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: chaba2
variable.comment: OFTEN A NONSPECIFIC SCAR. CAN BE FROM OLD TRAUMA, INFLAMMATION, OR MORE OFTEN, OF UNKNOWN ETIOLOGY. TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: lrgcda2
variable.comment: MAY BE A MARKER OF GLAUCOMA BUT CAN BE FOUND IN NORMAL EYES. DIFFICULT TO GRADE WHEN (AS WAS THE CASE IN MESA) IMAGES OF AN EYE ARE NOT TAKEN IN STEREO.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: mholea2
variable.comment: ROUND SHARPLY DEFINED HOLE INVOLVING CENTER OF MACULA RESULTING IN DECREASE IN VISUAL ACUITY (CHECK VISUAL ACUITY DATA).TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: nevusa2
variable.comment: LOCALIZED INCREASE IN NUMBER OF PIGMENT BEARING CELLS IN CHOROID USUALLY ROUND OR OVAL IN SHAPE.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: otrxa2
variable.comment: TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: pohsa2
variable.comment: USUALLY MANIFEST BY PERIPAPILLARY ATROPHIC SCARS, FOCAL ROUND CHORIORETINAL ACTIVE LESIONS OR PUNCHED OUT SCARS. TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: rdeta2
variable.comment: RARE IN MESA.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: swrca2
variable.description: SURFACE WRINKLING RETINOPATHY CELLO WORSE EYE
variable.comment: A PATCH OR PATCHES OF IRREGULAR INCREASED REFLECTION ON INNER SURFACE OF RETINA DUE TO MEMBRANE. CELLOPHANE CHANGES ONLY WITH NO TRACTION. CAN COMBINE WITH EPIRETINAL MEMBRANE (TRACTION CHANGES) variable 'swrta2'. TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE) TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: swrcra2
variable.description: SURFACE WRINKLING RETINOPATHY CELLO RIGHT EYE

variable.name: swrcla2
variable.description: SURFACE WRINKLING RETINOPATHY CELLO LEFT EYE

variable.name: swrta2
variable.description: SURFACE WRINKLING RETINOPATHY TRACTION WORSE EYE
variable.comment: A PATCH OR PATCHES OF IRREGULAR INCREASED REFLECTION ON INNER SURFACE OF RETINA DUE TO RETINAL TRACTION CHANGES OF MEMBRANE;CAN COMBINE WITH EPIRETINAL MEMBRANE CELLOPHANE CHANGES, variable 'swrca2'.TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 0 (NO) AND 1 (QUESTIONABLE)TO DEFINE ABSENT; 2 (YES) AND 3 (YES, IN CENTER) TO DEFINE PRESENT. IS A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: swrtra2
variable.description: SURFACE WRINKLING RETINOPATHY TRACTION RIGHT EYE

variable.name: swrtla2
variable.description: SURFACE WRINKLING RETINOPATHY TRACTION LEFT EYE

variable.name: craea2
variable.comment: NOTE: NOT A TRUE MEAN. IF ONE EYE WAS MISSING THEN CRAEA2 IS EQUAL TO THE NON-MISSING EYE. ONLY ABOUT 1000 LEFT EYES WERE READ IN MESA.See Comments for variables 'vmfocra2' and 'ungrra2'.IS A PHENOTYPE.SEE INVEST OPHTHALMOL VIS SCI 2006;47:2341-2350

variable.name: craera2
variable.description: CENTRAL RETINAL ARTERY EQUIVALENT - RIGHT EYE

variable.name: craela2
variable.description: CENTRAL RETINAL ARTERY EQUIVALENT - LEFT EYE

variable.name: crvea2
variable.comment: NOTE: NOT A TRUE MEAN. IF ONE EYE WAS MISSING THEN CRVEA2 IS EQUAL TO THE NON-MISSING EYE. ONLY ABOUT 1000 LEFT EYES WERE READ IN MESA.See Comments for variables 'vmfocra2' and 'ungrva2'.IS A PHENOTYPE.SEE INVEST OPHTHALMOL VIS SCI 2006;47:2341-2350

variable.name: crvera2
variable.description: CENTRAL RETINAL VEIN EQUIVALENT - RIGHT EYE

variable.name: crvela2
variable.description: CENTRAL RETINAL VEIN EQUIVALENT - LEFT EYE

variable.name: vmfocra2
variable.description: FOCUS EFFECT VESSEL MEASUREMENT RIGHT EYE
variable.comment: MAY WANT TO EXCLUDE EYES WITH '1' FROM ANALYSES USING CRAE OR CRVE;Variables (craea2 and crvea2) NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: vmfocla2
variable.description: FOCUS EFFECT VESSEL MEASUREMENT LEFT EYE

variable.name: ungara2
variable.comment: MAY WANT TO EXCLUDE EYES WITH '1' FROM ANALYSES USING CRAE;VARIABLES (craea2, craera2 and craela2) NOT A PHENOTYPE.

variable.name: ungvra2
variable.comment: MAY WANT TO EXCLUDE EYES WITH '1' FROM ANALYSES USING CRVE;VARIABLES (crvea2, crvera2 and crvela2)

variable.name: othera2
variable.description: OTHER RETINA LESION (SEE COMMENTS) WORSE EYE
variable.comment: REFERS TO RETINAL ABNORMALITIES NOT LISTED IN ANY OTHER VARIABLE IN THIS DATASET. Value 3 is more severe than value 2 and may be more likely to impact on vision (check vision acuity data).TRANSFORMATION SUGGESTION: COMBINE 2 (Yes) and 3 (Yes, in center) for present. NOT A PHENOTYPE.
